case_title: United States of America v. Whiteside et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Whiteside et al

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) USE AND CARRY A FIREARM DURING AND IN RELATION TO A CRIME OF VIOLENCE, TO WIT: BANK ROBBERY AND FORFEITURE ALLEGATION(2ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2: 84 months. Count 3: 132 months. Count 2 to be served consecutively to Count 3. Supervised Release of 3 years on each count, to be served concurrently. No fine imposed. Special Assessment total of $200.00. Restitution to Fifth Third Bank, joint and several with co-dft E. Hernandez in the amount of $13,265.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:922(a)(1) FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM AND FORFEITURE ALLEGATION(3ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Count 2: 84 months. Count 3: 132 months. Count 2 to be served consecutively to Count 3. Supervised Release of 3 years on each count, to be served concurrently. No fine imposed. Special Assessment total of $200.00. Restitution to Fifth Third Bank, joint and several with co-dft E. Hernandez in the amount of $13,265.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:2113(a) AND 2  BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE AND AIDING AND ABETTING(1)
18:2113(a) BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE and 18:2 AIDING &; ABETTING(1s)
18:2113(a) BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1ss)

charges.charge_disposition: Pursuant to Rule 48(a) of the FRCP, Count 1 is DISMISSED against dft R. Whiteside.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) USE AND CARRY A FIREARM DURING AND IN RELATION TO   VIOLENT CRIME AND FORFEITURE ALLEGATIONS(2)
18:924(c) USE OF A FIREARM DURING A CRIME OF VIOLENCE and FORFEITURE ALLEGATION(2s)
18:922(g)(1) FELON IN POSSESSION OF A FIREARM and FORFEITURE ALLEGATION(3s)
18:2113(a) BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE and 18:2 AIDING &; ABETTING(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: BOP-30 months. Supervised Release of 1 year. No fine imposed. Special Assessment of $100.00 Restitution (joint and several with co-dft) $13,185.00, payable at $200.00 per month.
